name: dark suggestion
description:
use g to restart a level

level 1+2:

Arrow keys to move blue player,

wasd to move red character,

m to interact with objects(blue player),

e to interact with objects(red player),

Push open the door with both players once everythings done,

level 3: 

wasd moves both characters,

arrow keys move both players,

level4:

same rules as level 1,

level 5:

same rules as level 1,

use r for sword( red player),

use l for sword( blue player),

theres a glith where sometimes attack damage doesn't register, in this case restart the level

2 players recommend, 1 can play as well

https://liluo.io/unbeatablegamingbit/dark-suggestion
